754 //template<typename CVertex, typename CEdge, typename CFace, typename CHalfEdge>
755 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
756 inline CHalfEdge * CBaseMesh<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge>::corner( tVertex v, tFace f)
757 {
758  CHalfEdge * he = faceMostCcwHalfEdge( f );
759  do{
760  if( he->vertex() == v )
761  return (CHalfEdge*) he;
762  he = faceNextCcwHalfEdge( he );
763  }while( he != faceMostCcwHalfEdge(f) );
764  return NULL;
765 };
771 //template<typename CVertex, typename CEdge, typename CFace, typename CHalfEdge>
772 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22

774 {

888 //template<typename CVertex, typename CEdge, typename CFace, typename CHalfEdge>
889 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
890 CBaseMesh<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge>::~CBaseMesh()
891 {
892  //remove vertices
893 
894  for( typename std::list<CVertex*>::iterator viter = m_verts.begin(); viter != m_verts.end(); viter ++ )
895  {
896  CVertex * pV = *viter;
897  delete pV;
898  }
899  m_verts.clear();
900 
901  //remove faces
902 
903  for( typename std::list<CFace*>::iterator fiter = m_faces.begin(); fiter != m_faces.end(); fiter ++ )
904  {
905  CFace * pF = *fiter;
906 
907  tHalfEdge he = faceHalfedge( pF );
908 
909  std::list<CHalfEdge*> hes;
910  do{
911  he = halfedgeNext( he );
912  hes.push_back( he );
913  }while( he != pF->halfedge() );
914 
915  for( typename std::list<CHalfEdge*>::iterator hiter = hes.begin(); hiter != hes.end(); hiter ++)
916  {
917  CHalfEdge * pH = *hiter;
918  delete pH;
919  }
920  hes.clear();
921 
922  delete pF;
923  }
924  m_faces.clear();
925 
926  //remove edges
927  for( typename std::list<CEdge*>::iterator eiter = m_edges.begin(); eiter != m_edges.end(); eiter ++ )
928  {
929  CEdge * pE = *eiter;
930  delete pE;
931  }
932 
933  m_edges.clear();
934 
935  //clear all the maps
936  m_map_vert.clear();
937  m_map_face.clear();
938  //m_map_edge.clear();
939 };
940 
944 //template<typename CVertex, typename CEdge, typename CFace, typename CHalfEdge>
945 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
946 double CBaseMesh<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge>::edgeLength( tEdge e )
947 {
948  CVertex * v1 = edgeVertex1(e);
949  CVertex * v2 = edgeVertex2(e);
950 
951  return ( v1->point() - v2->point() ).norm();
952 }

955 //create new geometric simplexes
961 //template<typename CVertex, typename CEdge, typename CFace, typename CHalfEdge>
962 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
963 CVertex * CBaseMesh<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge>::createVertex( int id )
964 {
965  CVertex * v = new CVertex();
966  assert( v != NULL );
967  v->id() = id;
968  m_verts.push_back( v );
969  m_map_vert.insert( std::pair<int,CVertex*>(id,v));
970  return v;
971 };

979 //template<typename CVertex, typename CEdge, typename CFace, typename CHalfEdge>
980 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
981 void CBaseMesh<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge>::read_obj( const char * filename )
982 {
983 
984  std::fstream f(filename, std::fstream::in);
985  if( f.fail() ) return;
986 
987  char cmd[1024];
988 
989  int vid = 1;
990  int fid = 1;
991 
992  bool with_uv = false;
993  bool with_normal = false;
994 
995  std::vector<CPoint2> uvs;
996  std::vector<CPoint> normals;
997 
998 
999  while ( f.getline( cmd, 1024) )
1000  {
1001  std::string line( cmd );
1002  line = strutil::trim( line );
1003 
1004  strutil::Tokenizer stokenizer( line, " \t\r\n" );
1005 
1006  stokenizer.nextToken();
1007  std::string token = stokenizer.getToken();
1008 
1009  if( token == "v" )
1010  {
1011  CPoint p;
1012  for( int i = 0; i < 3; i ++ )
1013  {
1014  stokenizer.nextToken();
1015  token = stokenizer.getToken();
1016  p[i] = strutil::parseString<float>(token);
1017  }
1018 
1019  CVertex * v = createVertex( vid);
1020  v->point() = p;
1021  vid ++;
1022  continue;
1023  }
1024 
1025 
1026  if( token == "vt" )
1027  {
1028  with_uv = true;
1029  CPoint2 uv;
1030  for( int i = 0; i < 2; i ++ )
1031  {
1032  stokenizer.nextToken();
1033  token = stokenizer.getToken();
1034  uv[i] = strutil::parseString<float>(token);
1035  }
1036  uvs.push_back( uv );
1037  continue;
1038  }
1039 
1040 
1041  if ( token == "vn" )
1042  {
1043  with_normal = true;
1044 
1045  CPoint n;
1046  for( int i = 0; i < 3; i ++ )
1047  {
1048  stokenizer.nextToken();
1049  token = stokenizer.getToken();
1050  n[i] = strutil::parseString<float>(token);
1051  }
1052  normals.push_back( n );
1053  continue;
1054  }
1055 
1056 
1057 
1058 
1059  if ( token == "f" )
1060  {
1061  CVertex* v[3];
1062  for( int i = 0 ; i < 3; i ++ )
1063  {
1064  stokenizer.nextToken();
1065  token = stokenizer.getToken();
1066 
1067 
1068  strutil::Tokenizer tokenizer( token, " /\t\r\n" );
1069 
1070  int ids[3];
1071  int k = 0;
1072  while( tokenizer.nextToken() )
1073  {
1074  std::string token = tokenizer.getToken();
1075  ids[k] = strutil::parseString<int>(token);
1076  k ++;
1077  }
1078 
1079 
1080  v[i] = m_map_vert[ ids[0] ];
1081  if( with_uv )
1082  v[i]->uv() = uvs[ ids[1]-1 ];
1083  if( with_normal )
1084  v[i]->normal() = normals[ ids[2]-1 ];
1085  }
1086  createFace( v, fid++ );
1087  }
1088  }
1089 
1090  f.close();
1091 
1092  labelBoundary();
1093 }
1094 
1101 //template<typename CVertex, typename CEdge, typename CFace, typename CHalfEdge>
1102 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
1103 CFace * CBaseMesh<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge>::createFace( tVertex v[] , int id )
1104 {
1105  CFace * f = new CFace();
1106  assert( f != NULL );
1107  f->id() = id;
1108  m_faces.push_back( f );
1109  m_map_face.insert( std::pair<int,tFace>(id,f) );
1110 
1111  //create halfedges
1112  tHalfEdge hes[3];
1113 
1114  for(int i = 0; i < 3; i ++ )
1115  {
1116  hes[i] = new CHalfEdge;
1117  assert( hes[i] );
1118  CVertex * vert = v[i];
1119  hes[i]->vertex() = vert;
1120  vert->halfedge() = hes[i];
1121  }
1122 
1123  //linking to each other
1124  for(int i = 0; i < 3; i ++ )
1125  {
1126  hes[i]->he_next() = hes[(i+1)%3];
1127  hes[i]->he_prev() = hes[(i+2)%3];
1128  }
1129 
1130  //linking to face
1131  for(int i = 0; i < 3; i ++ )
1132  {
1133  hes[i]->face() = f;
1134  f->halfedge() = hes[i];
1135  }
1136 
1137  //connecting with edge
1138  for(int i = 0; i < 3; i ++ )
1139  {
1140  tEdge e = createEdge( v[i], v[(i+2)%3] );
1141  if( e->halfedge(0) == NULL )
1142  {
1143  e->halfedge(0) = hes[i];
1144  }
1145  else
1146  {
1147  assert( e->halfedge(1) == NULL );
1148  e->halfedge(1) = hes[i];
1149  }
1150  hes[i]->edge() = e;
1151  }
1152 
1153  return f;
1154 };
1155 
1156

1163 //template<typename CVertex, typename CEdge, typename CFace, typename CHalfEdge>
1164 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
1165 CVertex * CBaseMesh<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge>::idVertex( int id )
1166 {
1167  return m_map_vert[id];
1168 };
1169

1181 };

1183 //access id->f
1189 //template<typename CVertex, typename CEdge, typename CFace, typename CHalfEdge>
1190 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22

1196 //acess f->id

1203 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
1204 inline int CBaseMesh<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge>::faceId( tFace f )

1215 //template<typename CVertex, typename CEdge, typename CFace, typename CHalfEdge>
1216 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
1217 CEdge * CBaseMesh<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge>::createEdge( tVertex v1, tVertex v2 )
1218 {
1219  tVertex pV = ( v1->id()<v2->id())?v1:v2;
1220  std::list<CEdge*> & ledges = (std::list<CEdge*> &) pV->edges();
1221 
1222 
1223  for( typename std::list<CEdge*>::iterator te = ledges.begin(); te != ledges.end(); te ++ )
1224  {
1225  CEdge * pE = *te;
1226  CHalfEdge * pH = (CHalfEdge*) pE->halfedge(0);
1227 
1228  if( pH->source() == v1 && pH->target() == v2 )
1229  {
1230  return pE;
1231  }
1232  if( pH->source() == v2 && pH->target() == v1 )
1233  {
1234  return pE;
1235  }
1236  }
1237 
1238  //new edge
1239  CEdge * e = new CEdge;
1240  assert( e != NULL );
1241  m_edges.push_back( e );
1242  ledges.push_back( e );
1243 
1244 
1245  return e;
1246 
1247 };
1248 
1249 
1250 
1251 //access vertex->edge
1258 //use the edge list associated with each vertex to locate the edge
1259 
1260 //template<typename CVertex, typename CEdge, typename CFace, typename CHalfEdge>
1261 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
1262 inline CEdge * CBaseMesh<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge>::vertexEdge( tVertex v0, tVertex v1 )
1263 {
1264  CVertex * pV = (v0->id() < v1->id() )? v0: v1;
1265  std::list<CEdge*> & ledges = vertexEdges( pV );
1266 
1267  for( typename std::list<CEdge*>::iterator eiter = ledges.begin(); eiter != ledges.end(); eiter ++ )
1268  {
1269  CEdge * pE = *eiter;
1270  CHalfEdge * pH = edgeHalfedge(pE,0);
1271  if( pH->source() == v0 && pH->target() == v1 ) return pE;
1272  if( pH->source() == v1 && pH->target() == v0 ) return pE;
1273  }
1274  return NULL;
1275 };
1276 
1284 //access vertex->halfedge
1285 //template<typename CVertex, typename CEdge, typename CFace, typename CHalfEdge>
1286 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
1287 inline CHalfEdge * CBaseMesh<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge>::vertexHalfedge( tVertex v0, tVertex v1 )
1288 {
1289  CEdge * e = vertexEdge( v0, v1 );
1290  assert( e != NULL );
1291  CHalfEdge * he = (CHalfEdge*) e->halfedge(0);
1292  if( he->vertex() == v1 && he->he_prev()->vertex() == v0 ) return he;
1293  he = (CHalfEdge*) e->halfedge(1);
1294  assert( he->vertex() == v1 && he->he_prev()->vertex() == v0 );
1295  return he;
1296 };
1297

1305 //access vertex->edges
1306 //template<typename CVertex, typename CEdge, typename CFace, typename CHalfEdge>
1307 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
1308 inline std::list<CEdge*> & CBaseMesh<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge>::vertexEdges( tVertex v0 )
1309 {
1310  return (std::list<CEdge*> &)v0->edges();
1311 };
1312 
1313 //access vertex->halfedge
1319 //template<typename CVertex, typename CEdge, typename CFace, typename CHalfEdge>
1320 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
1321 inline CHalfEdge * CBaseMesh<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge>::vertexHalfedge( tVertex v )
1322 {
1323  return (CHalfEdge*) v->halfedge();
1324 };

1330 //template<typename CVertex, typename CEdge, typename CFace, typename CHalfEdge>
1331 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
1332 void CBaseMesh<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge>::read_m( const char * input )
1333 {
1334  std::fstream is( input, std::fstream::in );
1335 
1336  if( is.fail() )
1337  {
1338  fprintf(stderr,"Error in opening file %s\n", input );
1339  return;
1340  }
1341 
1342  char buffer[MAX_LINE];
1343  int id;
1344 
1345  while( is.getline(buffer, MAX_LINE ) )
1346  {
1347 
1348  std::string line( buffer );
1349  line = strutil::trim( line );
1350 
1351  strutil::Tokenizer stokenizer( line, " \r\n" );
1352 
1353  stokenizer.nextToken();
1354  std::string token = stokenizer.getToken();
1355 
1356  if( token == "Vertex" )
1357  {
1358  stokenizer.nextToken();
1359  token = stokenizer.getToken();
1360  id = strutil::parseString<int>(token);
1361 
1362  CPoint p;
1363  for( int i = 0 ; i < 3; i ++ )
1364  {
1365  stokenizer.nextToken();
1366  token = stokenizer.getToken();
1367  p[i] = strutil::parseString<float>(token);
1368  }
1369 
1370  tVertex v = createVertex( id );
1371  v->point() = p;
1372  v->id() = id;
1373 
1374  if( ! stokenizer.nextToken("\t\r\n") ) continue;
1375  token = stokenizer.getToken();
1376 
1377  int sp = (int) token.find("{");
1378  int ep = (int) token.find("}");
1379 
1380  if( sp >= 0 && ep >= 0 )
1381  {
1382  v->string() = token.substr( sp+1, ep-sp-1 );
1383  }
1384  continue;
1385  }
1386 
1387 
1388  if( token == "Face" )
1389  {
1390 
1391  stokenizer.nextToken();
1392  token = stokenizer.getToken();
1393  id = strutil::parseString<int>(token);
1394 
1395  std::vector<CVertex*> v;
1396  while( stokenizer.nextToken() )
1397  {
1398  token = stokenizer.getToken();
1399  if( strutil::startsWith( token, "{" ) ) break;
1400  int vid = strutil::parseString<int>(token);
1401  v.push_back( idVertex( vid ) );
1402  }
1403 
1404  tFace f = createFace( v, id );
1405 
1406  if( strutil::startsWith( token, "{" ) )
1407  {
1408  f->string() = strutil::trim( token, "{}" );
1409  }
1410  continue;
1411  }
1412 
1413  //read in edge attributes
1414  if( token == "Edge" )
1415  {
1416  stokenizer.nextToken();
1417  token = stokenizer.getToken();
1418  int id0 = strutil::parseString<int>( token );
1419 
1420  stokenizer.nextToken();
1421  token = stokenizer.getToken();
1422  int id1 = strutil::parseString<int>( token );
1423 
1424 
1425  CVertex * v0 = idVertex( id0 );
1426  CVertex * v1 = idVertex( id1 );
1427 
1428  tEdge edge = vertexEdge( v0, v1 );
1429 
1430  if( !stokenizer.nextToken("\t\r\n") ) continue;
1431  token = stokenizer.getToken();
1432 
1433  int sp = (int) token.find("{");
1434  int ep = (int) token.find("}");
1435 
1436  if( sp >= 0 && ep >= 0 )
1437  {
1438  edge->string() = token.substr( sp+1, ep-sp-1 );
1439  }
1440  continue;
1441  }
1442 
1443  //read in edge attributes
1444  if( token == "Corner" )
1445  {
1446  stokenizer.nextToken();
1447  token = stokenizer.getToken();
1448  int vid = strutil::parseString<int>( token );
1449 
1450  stokenizer.nextToken();
1451  token = stokenizer.getToken();
1452  int fid = strutil::parseString<int>( token );
1453 
1454 
1455  CVertex * v = idVertex( vid );
1456  CFace * f = idFace( fid );
1457  tHalfEdge he = corner( v, f );
1458 
1459 
1460  if( !stokenizer.nextToken("\t\r\n") ) continue;
1461  token = stokenizer.getToken();
1462 
1463  int sp = (int) token.find("{");
1464  int ep = (int) token.find("}");
1465 
1466  if( sp >= 0 && ep >= 0 )
1467  {
1468  he->string() = token.substr( sp+1, ep-sp-1 );
1469  }
1470  continue;
1471  }
1472  }
1473 
1474  //labelBoundary();
1475 
1476  //Label boundary edges
1477  for(typename std::list<CEdge*>::iterator eiter= m_edges.begin() ; eiter != m_edges.end() ; ++ eiter )
1478  {
1479  CEdge * edge = *eiter;
1480  CHalfEdge * he[2];
1481 
1482  he[0] = edgeHalfedge( edge, 0 );
1483  he[1] = edgeHalfedge( edge, 1 );
1484 
1485  assert( he[0] != NULL );
1486 
1487 
1488  if( he[1] != NULL )
1489  {
1490  assert( he[0]->target() == he[1]->source() && he[0]->source() == he[1]->target() );
1491 
1492  if( he[0]->target()->id() < he[0]->source()->id() )
1493  {
1494  edge->halfedge(0 ) = he[1];
1495  edge->halfedge(1 ) = he[0];
1496  }
1497 
1498  assert( edgeVertex1(edge)->id() < edgeVertex2(edge)->id() );
1499  }
1500  else
1501  {
1502  he[0]->vertex()->boundary() = true;
1503  he[0]->he_prev()->vertex()->boundary() = true;
1504  }
1505 
1506  }
1507 
1508  std::list<CVertex*> dangling_verts;
1509  //Label boundary edges
1510  for(typename std::list<CVertex*>::iterator viter = m_verts.begin(); viter != m_verts.end() ; ++ viter )
1511  {
1512  CVertex * v = *viter;
1513  if( v->halfedge() != NULL ) continue;
1514  dangling_verts.push_back( v );
1515  }
1516 
1517  for( typename std::list<CVertex*>::iterator viter = dangling_verts.begin() ; viter != dangling_verts.end(); ++ viter )
1518  {
1519  CVertex * v = *viter;
1520  m_verts.remove( v );
1521  delete v;
1522  v = NULL;
1523  }
1524 
1525  //Arrange the boundary half_edge of boundary vertices, to make its halfedge
1526  //to be the most ccw in half_edge
1527 
1528  for( typename std::list<CVertex*>::iterator viter = m_verts.begin(); viter != m_verts.end() ; ++ viter )
1529  {
1530  CVertex * v = *viter;
1531  if( !v->boundary() ) continue;
1532 
1533  CHalfEdge * he = vertexMostCcwInHalfEdge( v );
1534  while( he->he_sym() != NULL )
1535  {
1536  he = vertexNextCcwInHalfEdge ( he );
1537  }
1538  v->halfedge() = he;
1539  }
1540 
1541  //read in the traits
1542 
1543  for( typename std::list<CVertex*>::iterator viter = m_verts.begin(); viter != m_verts.end() ; ++ viter )
1544  {
1545  CVertex * v = *viter;
1546  v->_from_string();
1547  }
1548 
1549  for( typename std::list<CEdge*>::iterator eiter = m_edges.begin(); eiter != m_edges.end() ; ++ eiter )
1550  {
1551  CEdge * e = *eiter;
1552  e->_from_string();
1553  }
1554 
1555  for( typename std::list<CFace*>::iterator fiter = m_faces.begin(); fiter != m_faces.end() ; ++ fiter )
1556  {
1557  CFace * f = *fiter;
1558  f->_from_string();
1559  }
1560 
1561  for( typename std::list<CFace*>::iterator fiter=m_faces.begin(); fiter != m_faces.end(); fiter ++ )
1562  {
1563  CFace * pF = *fiter;
1564 
1565  CHalfEdge * pH = faceMostCcwHalfEdge( pF );
1566  do{
1567  pH->_from_string();
1568  pH = faceNextCcwHalfEdge( pH );
1569  }while( pH != faceMostCcwHalfEdge(pF ) );
1570  }
1571 
1572 };
1573 
1578 //template<typename CVertex, typename CEdge, typename CFace, typename CHalfEdge>
1579 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
1580 void CBaseMesh<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge>::write_m( const char * output )
1581 {
1582  //write traits to string
1583  for( typename std::list<CVertex*>::iterator viter=m_verts.begin(); viter != m_verts.end(); viter ++ )
1584  {
1585  CVertex * pV = *viter;
1586  pV->_to_string();
1587  }
1588 
1589  for( typename std::list<CEdge*>::iterator eiter=m_edges.begin(); eiter != m_edges.end(); eiter ++ )
1590  {
1591  CEdge * pE = *eiter;
1592  pE->_to_string();
1593  }
1594 
1595  for( typename std::list<CFace*>::iterator fiter=m_faces.begin(); fiter != m_faces.end(); fiter ++ )
1596  {
1597  CFace * pF = *fiter;
1598  pF->_to_string();
1599  }
1600 
1601  for( typename std::list<CFace*>::iterator fiter=m_faces.begin(); fiter != m_faces.end(); fiter ++ )
1602  {
1603  CFace * pF = *fiter;
1604  CHalfEdge * pH = faceMostCcwHalfEdge( pF );
1605  do{
1606  pH->_to_string();
1607  pH = faceNextCcwHalfEdge( pH );
1608  }while( pH != faceMostCcwHalfEdge(pF ) );
1609  }
1610 
1611 
1612  std::fstream _os( output, std::fstream::out );
1613  if( _os.fail() )
1614  {
1615  fprintf(stderr,"Error is opening file %s\n", output );
1616  return;
1617  }
1618 
1619 
1620  //remove vertices
1621  for( typename std::list<CVertex*>::iterator viter = m_verts.begin(); viter != m_verts.end(); viter ++)
1622  {
1623  tVertex v = *viter;
1624 
1625  _os << "Vertex " << v->id();
1626 
1627  for( int i = 0; i < 3; i ++ )
1628  {
1629  _os << " " << v->point()[i];
1630  }
1631  if( v->string().size() > 0 )
1632  {
1633  _os << " " <<"{"<< v->string() << "}";
1634  }
1635  _os << std::endl;
1636  }
1637 
1638  for( typename std::list<CFace*>::iterator fiter = m_faces.begin(); fiter != m_faces.end(); fiter ++ )
1639  {
1640  tFace f = *fiter;
1641 
1642  _os << "Face " << f->id();
1643  tHalfEdge he = faceHalfedge( f );
1644  do{
1645  _os << " " << he->target()->id();
1646  he = halfedgeNext( he );
1647  }while( he != f->halfedge() );
1648 
1649  if( f->string().size() > 0 )
1650  {
1651  _os << " " << "{"<< f->string() << "}";
1652  }
1653  _os << std::endl;
1654  }
1655 
1656  for( typename std::list<CEdge*>::iterator eiter = m_edges.begin(); eiter != m_edges.end(); eiter ++ )
1657  {
1658  tEdge e = *eiter;
1659  if( e->string().size() > 0 )
1660  {
1661  _os << "Edge "<< edgeVertex1(e)->id() <<" " << edgeVertex2(e)->id() << " ";
1662  _os << "{" << e->string() << "}" << std::endl;
1663  }
1664  }
1665 
1666  for( typename std::list<CFace*>::iterator fiter = m_faces.begin(); fiter != m_faces.end(); fiter ++ )
1667  {
1668  tFace f = *fiter;
1669 
1670  tHalfEdge he = faceHalfedge( f );
1671 
1672  do{
1673  if( he->string().size() > 0 )
1674  {
1675  _os << "Corner "<< he->vertex()->id() << " " << f->id() << " ";
1676  _os << "{" << he->string() << "}" << std::endl;
1677  }
1678  he = halfedgeNext( he );
1679  }while( he != f->halfedge() );
1680 
1681  }
1682 
1683  _os.close();
1684 };
1685 
1686 
1687 //assume the mesh is with uv coordinates and normal vector for each vertex
1692 //template<typename CVertex, typename CEdge, typename CFace, typename CHalfEdge>
1693 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
1694 void CBaseMesh<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge>::write_obj( const char * output )
1695 {
1696  std::fstream _os( output, std::fstream::out );
1697  if( _os.fail() )
1698  {
1699  fprintf(stderr,"Error is opening file %s\n", output );
1700  return;
1701  }
1702 
1703  int vid = 1;
1704  for( typename std::list<CVertex*>::iterator viter = m_verts.begin(); viter != m_verts.end(); viter ++)
1705  {
1706  tVertex v = *viter;
1707  v->id() = vid ++;
1708  }
1709 
1710  for( typename std::list<CVertex*>::iterator viter = m_verts.begin(); viter != m_verts.end(); viter ++)
1711  {
1712  tVertex v = *viter;
1713 
1714  _os << "v";
1715 
1716  for( int i = 0; i < 3; i ++ )
1717  {
1718  _os << " " << v->point()[i];
1719  }
1720  _os << std::endl;
1721  }
1722 
1723  for( typename std::list<CVertex*>::iterator viter = m_verts.begin(); viter != m_verts.end(); viter ++)
1724  {
1725  tVertex v = *viter;
1726 
1727  _os << "vt";
1728 
1729  for( int i = 0; i < 2; i ++ )
1730  {
1731  _os << " " << v->uv()[i];
1732  }
1733  _os << std::endl;
1734  }
1735 
1736  for( typename std::list<CVertex*>::iterator viter = m_verts.begin(); viter != m_verts.end(); viter ++)
1737  {
1738  tVertex v = *viter;
1739 
1740  _os << "vn";
1741 
1742  for( int i = 0; i < 3; i ++ )
1743  {
1744  _os << " " << v->normal()[i];
1745  }
1746  _os << std::endl;
1747  }
1748 
1749 
1750  for( typename std::list<CFace*>::iterator fiter = m_faces.begin(); fiter != m_faces.end(); fiter ++ )
1751  {
1752  tFace f = *fiter;
1753 
1754  _os << "f";
1755 
1756  tHalfEdge he = faceHalfedge( f );
1757 
1758  do{
1759  int vid = he->target()->id();
1760  _os << " " << vid << "/" << vid << "/" << vid;
1761  he = halfedgeNext( he );
1762  }while( he != f->halfedge() );
1763  _os << std::endl;
1764  }
1765 
1766  _os.close();
1767 };

1773 //template<typename CVertex, typename CEdge, typename CFace, typename CHalfEdge>
1774 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
1775 void CBaseMesh<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge>::write_off( const char * output )
1776 {
1777  std::fstream _os( output, std::fstream::out );
1778  if( _os.fail() )
1779  {
1780  fprintf(stderr,"Error is opening file %s\n", output );
1781  return;
1782  }
1783 
1784  _os << "OFF" << std::endl;
1785  _os << m_verts.size() << " " << m_faces.size() << " " << m_edges.size() << std::endl;
1786 
1787 
1788  int vid = 0;
1789  for( typename std::list<CVertex*>::iterator viter = m_verts.begin(); viter != m_verts.end(); viter ++)
1790  {
1791  tVertex v = *viter;
1792  v->id() = vid ++;
1793  }
1794 
1795  for( typename std::list<CVertex*>::iterator viter = m_verts.begin(); viter != m_verts.end(); viter ++)
1796  {
1797  tVertex v = *viter;
1798  _os << v->point()[0] << " " << v->point()[1] << " " << v->point()[2]<< std::endl;
1799  //_os << v->normal()[0] << " " << v->normal()[1]<< " " << v->normal()[2]<< std::endl;
1800  }
1801 
1802 
1803  for( typename std::list<CFace*>::iterator fiter = m_faces.begin(); fiter != m_faces.end(); fiter ++ )
1804  {
1805  tFace f = *fiter;
1806 
1807  _os << "3";
1808 
1809  tHalfEdge he = faceHalfedge( f );
1810 
1811  do{
1812  int vid = he->target()->id();
1813  _os << " " << vid;
1814  he = halfedgeNext( he );
1815  }while( he != f->halfedge() );
1816  _os << std::endl;
1817  }
1818 
1819  _os.close();
1820 };
1821 
1822 
1823 //template pointer converting to base class pointer is OK (BasePointer) = (TemplatePointer)
1824 //(TemplatePointer)=(BasePointer) is incorrect
1829 //template<typename CVertex, typename CEdge, typename CFace, typename CHalfEdge>
1830 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
1831 void CBaseMesh<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge>::deleteFace( tFace pFace )
1832 {
1833  typename std::map<int,tFace>::iterator fiter = m_map_face.find( pFace->id() );
1834  if( fiter != m_map_face.end() )
1835  {
1836  m_map_face.erase( fiter );
1837  }
1838  m_faces.remove( pFace );
1839 
1840 
1841  //create halfedges
1842  tHalfEdge hes[3];
1843 
1844  hes[0] = faceHalfedge( pFace );
1845  hes[1] = faceNextCcwHalfEdge( hes[0] );
1846  hes[2] = faceNextCcwHalfEdge( hes[1] );
1847 
1848  for(int i = 0; i < 3; i ++ )
1849  {
1850  //connection with edge
1851  CHalfEdge * pH = hes[i];
1852 
1853  //connection to target
1854  CVertex * pV = halfedgeTarget( pH );
1855  if( pV->halfedge() == pH )
1856  {
1857  if( pH->he_next()->he_sym() != NULL )
1858  pV->halfedge() = pH->he_next()->he_sym();
1859  else
1860  {
1861  assert( pH->he_sym() != NULL ); //otherwise the mesh is not a manifold
1862  pV->halfedge() = pH->he_sym()->he_prev();
1863  }
1864  }
1865  }
1866 
1867  for(int i = 0; i < 3; i ++ )
1868  {
1869  //connection with edge
1870  CHalfEdge * pH = hes[i];
1871  CHalfEdge * pS = halfedgeSym( pH );
1872  CEdge * pE = halfedgeEdge( pH );
1873 
1874  pE->halfedge(0) = pS;
1875  pE->halfedge(1) = NULL;
1876 
1877  if( pS == NULL )
1878  {
1879  //assert(0);
1880  m_edges.remove( pE );
1881  CVertex * v0 = halfedgeSource( pH );
1882  CVertex * v1 = halfedgeTarget( pH );
1883  delete pE;
1884  }
1885 
1886 
1887  }
1888 
1889  //remove half edges
1890  for(int i = 0; i < 3; i ++ )
1891  {
1892  delete hes[i];
1893  }
1894 
1895  delete pFace;
1896 };
1897 
1902 //template<typename CVertex, typename CEdge, typename CFace, typename CHalfEdge>
1903 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
1904 void CBaseMesh<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge>::read_off( const char * input )
1905 {
1906  std::fstream is( input, std::fstream::in );
1907 
1908  if( is.fail() )
1909  {
1910  fprintf(stderr,"Error is opening file %s\n", input );
1911  return;
1912  }
1913 
1914  char buffer[MAX_LINE];
1915 
1916  //read in the first line "OFF"
1917 
1918  while( is.getline(buffer, MAX_LINE ) )
1919  {
1920  std::string line( buffer );
1921 
1922  strutil::Tokenizer stokenizer( line, " \r\n" );
1923 
1924  stokenizer.nextToken();
1925  std::string token = stokenizer.getToken();
1926  if( token == "OFF" || token == "NOFF" ) break;
1927  }
1928 
1929  int nVertices, nFaces, nEdges;
1930 
1931  //read in Vertex Number, Face Number, Edge Number
1932 
1933  is.getline(buffer, MAX_LINE );
1934  std::string line( buffer );
1935 
1936  strutil::Tokenizer stokenizer( line, " \r\n" );
1937 
1938  stokenizer.nextToken();
1939  std::string token = stokenizer.getToken();
1940  nVertices = strutil::parseString<int>( token );
1941 
1942  stokenizer.nextToken();
1943  token = stokenizer.getToken();
1944  nFaces = strutil::parseString<int>( token );
1945 
1946  stokenizer.nextToken();
1947  token = stokenizer.getToken();
1948  nEdges = strutil::parseString<int>( token );
1949 
1950  //printf("V %d F %d E %d\n" , nVertices, nFaces, nEdges);
1951 
1952 
1953  for( int id = 0; id < nVertices; id ++ )
1954  {
1955  is.getline(buffer, MAX_LINE );
1956  std::string line( buffer );
1957 
1958  strutil::Tokenizer stokenizer( line, " \r\n" );
1959  CPoint p;
1960  for( int j = 0; j < 3; j ++ )
1961  {
1962  stokenizer.nextToken();
1963  std::string token = stokenizer.getToken();
1964  p[j] = strutil::parseString<float>( token );
1965  }
1966 
1967  CVertex * v = createVertex( id + 1 );
1968  v->point() = p;
1969  }
1970 
1971 
1972  for( int id = 0; id < nFaces; id ++ )
1973  {
1974 
1975  is.getline(buffer, MAX_LINE );
1976  std::string line( buffer );
1977 
1978  strutil::Tokenizer stokenizer( line, " \r\n" );
1979  stokenizer.nextToken();
1980  std::string token = stokenizer.getToken();
1981 
1982  int n = strutil::parseString<int>(token);
1983  assert( n == 3 );
1984 
1985  CVertex * v[3];
1986  for( int j = 0; j < 3; j ++ )
1987  {
1988  stokenizer.nextToken();
1989  std::string token = stokenizer.getToken();
1990  int vid = strutil::parseString<int>( token );
1991  v[j] = idVertex( vid + 1);
1992  }
1993 
1994  createFace( v, id + 1 );
1995  }
1996 
1997  is.close();
1998 
1999  labelBoundary();
2000 
2001 };
2002 
2003 
2007 //template<typename CVertex, typename CEdge, typename CFace, typename CHalfEdge>
2008 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
2009 void CBaseMesh<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge>::labelBoundary( void )
2010 {
2011 
2012  //Label boundary edges
2013  for( typename std::list<CEdge*>::iterator eiter= m_edges.begin() ; eiter != m_edges.end() ; ++ eiter )
2014  {
2015  CEdge * edge = *eiter;
2016  CHalfEdge * he[2];
2017 
2018  he[0] = (CHalfEdge*)edge->halfedge(0);
2019  he[1] = (CHalfEdge*)edge->halfedge(1);
2020 
2021  assert( he[0] != NULL );
2022 
2023 
2024  if( he[1] != NULL )
2025  {
2026  assert( he[0]->target() == he[1]->source() && he[0]->source() == he[1]->target() );
2027 
2028  if( he[0]->target()->id() < he[0]->source()->id() )
2029  {
2030  edge->halfedge(0 ) = he[1];
2031  edge->halfedge(1 ) = he[0];
2032  }
2033 
2034  assert( edgeVertex1(edge)->id() < edgeVertex2(edge)->id() );
2035  }
2036  else
2037  {
2038  he[0]->vertex()->boundary() = true;
2039  he[0]->he_prev()->vertex()->boundary() = true;
2040  }
2041 
2042  }
2043 
2044  std::list<CVertex*> dangling_verts;
2045  //Label boundary edges
2046  for( typename std::list<CVertex*>::iterator viter = m_verts.begin(); viter != m_verts.end() ; ++ viter )
2047  {
2048  tVertex v = *viter;
2049  if( v->halfedge() != NULL ) continue;
2050  dangling_verts.push_back( v );
2051  }
2052 
2053  for( typename std::list<CVertex*>::iterator viter = dangling_verts.begin() ; viter != dangling_verts.end(); ++ viter )
2054  {
2055  tVertex v = *viter;
2056  m_verts.remove( v );
2057  delete v;
2058  v = NULL;
2059  }
2060 
2061  //Arrange the boundary half_edge of boundary vertices, to make its halfedge
2062  //to be the most ccw in half_edge
2063 
2064  for( typename std::list<CVertex*>::iterator viter = m_verts.begin(); viter != m_verts.end() ; ++ viter )
2065  {
2066  tVertex v = *viter;
2067  if( !v->boundary() ) continue;
2068 
2069  CHalfEdge * he = (CHalfEdge*)v->halfedge();
2070  while( he->he_sym() != NULL )
2071  {
2072  he = (CHalfEdge*)he->ccw_rotate_about_target();
2073  }
2074  v->halfedge() = he;
2075  }
2076 
2077 
2078 };
2079 
2086 //template<typename CVertex, typename CEdge, typename CFace, typename CHalfEdge>
2087 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
2088 CFace * CBaseMesh<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge>::createFace( std::vector<tVertex> & v, int id )
2089 {
2090  CFace * f = new CFace();
2091  assert( f != NULL );
2092  f->id() = id;
2093  m_faces.push_back( f );
2094  m_map_face.insert( std::pair<int,tFace>(id,f) );
2095 
2096  //create halfedges
2097  std::vector<tHalfEdge> hes;
2098 
2099  for(size_t i = 0; i < v.size(); i ++ )
2100  {
2101  tHalfEdge pH = new CHalfEdge;
2102  assert( pH );
2103  CVertex * vert = v[i];
2104  pH->vertex() = vert;
2105  vert->halfedge() = pH;
2106  hes.push_back( pH );
2107  }
2108 
2109  //linking to each other
2110  for( size_t i = 0; i < hes.size(); i ++ )
2111  {
2112  hes[i]->he_next() = hes[(i+1)%hes.size()];
2113  hes[i]->he_prev() = hes[(i+hes.size()-1)%hes.size()];
2114  }
2115 
2116  //linking to face
2117  for(size_t i = 0; i < hes.size(); i ++ )
2118  {
2119  hes[i]->face() = f;
2120  f->halfedge() = hes[i];
2121  }
2122 
2123  //connecting with edge
2124  for( size_t i = 0; i < hes.size(); i ++ )
2125  {
2126  tEdge e = createEdge( v[i], v[(i+hes.size()-1)%hes.size()] );
2127  if( e->halfedge(0) == NULL )
2128  {
2129  e->halfedge(0) = hes[i];
2130  }
2131  else
2132  {
2133  assert( e->halfedge(1) == NULL );
2134  if( e->halfedge(1) != NULL )
2135  {
2136  std::cout << "Illegal Face Construction " << id << std::endl;
2137  }
2138  e->halfedge(1) = hes[i];
2139  }
2140  hes[i]->edge() = e;
2141  }
2142 
2143  return f;
2144 };
2145 
2146 
2147 }//name space MeshLib
